snippet.title: Mike V: Skateboard Party HD Trailer - Video Game Available For iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and Android
snippet.description:
For more details visit: http://mikevskateparty.com

The only HD skateboarding game available! Play with your friends using the multiplayer mode, complete achievements, gain experience and upgrade your skaters. Customize your outfits, shoes, board, trucks, wheels and bearings. Challenge skaters from all over the world using Game Center leaderboards.

• The only HD Skateboarding game available on the market.
• Multiplayer mode to play against your friends.
• New, fully customizable control system.
• Learn over 40 tricks, create hundreds of combinations.
• Massive skateboard locations to ride including a community center, motel, downtown plaza, junkyard and indoor skatepark.
• Customize your skater or board with tons of exclusive content including outfits, shoes, boards, trucks, wheels and bearings. Select from your favorite brands including Airwalk, Powell & Peralta, Tork Trux and Iron Fist Clothing.
• Gain experience and upgrade your skater's attributes.
• Game Center achievements & leaderboards.
• Share your results with your friends on Facebook or Twitter.
• Soundtrack by Conditions & Revolution Mother.
• Ability to listen to your own music library.
• Universal version for all your iOS devices. 

Visit us at http://ratrodstudio.com
